content.en: Algorithmic diagnosis: Researchers have been investigating how algorithms can improve the accuracy of diagnosing and predicting coronary artery disease. They have compared different methods, such as Bayesian and logistic regression, to determine the best approach. These algorithms aim to provide guidelines and recommendations for a more uniform and effective diagnosis of coronary artery disease, particularly in women.
content.da: Algoritmisk diagnose: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre nøjagtigheden af at diagnosticere og forudsige koronararteriesygdom. De har sammenlignet forskellige metoder som Bayesiansk og logistisk regression for at finde den bedste tilgang. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at give retningslinjer og anbefalinger for en mere ensartet og effektiv diagnose af koronararteriesygdom, især hos kvinder.
